page.title: 09HOMELIFE
page.content: Most of the cottages in this area have cesspits and all have bathrooms. All have facilities for modern electrical appliances and many have television,washing machines and computers. The tenants prefer to heat their homes by using wood which is readily available. There are no country bus services serving these small villages and most families own a car.There is a free daily bus service to the{Primary}and {Comprehensive}schools in{Whitchurch. The whole area is covered by a{Mobile {Library}and{Housebound Library {Service.
